channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why the origin of the word 'dog' remains a mystery
item.description: Although "dog" is ubiquitous today to describe man's best friend, it remains a mystery where the word originally came from.

item.title: Help is growing for the heavy emotional toll cancer takes on young men
item.description: Coping with cancer and its aftermath isn't easy for anyone. But men tend to isolate more, seek less support and, alarmingly, die earlier than women. Y...

item.title: High prices and healthcare costs may turn Latino voters away from Republicans in 2026
item.description: Latino voters helped deliver the White House to President Trump in the last election but many of them already say they won't vote for Republicans next...

item.title: With replay review and 'robot umps,' who is still trying to become an MLB umpire?
item.description: Between replay review, automated balls and strikes and viral lowlights on social media, the work of baseball umpires has been transformed by technolog...

item.title: Inside one of the most understaffed immigration courts in the country
item.description: The Chelmsford, Mass., court has hemorrhaged judges, a consequence of the Trump administration's seemingly contradictory efforts to downsize the feder...

item.title: The row over 'vote theft' that has shaken Indian politics
item.description: Opposition parties have made allegations of electoral irregularities, which the India's poll body has denied.

item.title: Trump, Zelenskyy, NATO nations set for call ahead of Trump-Putin summit
item.description: Presidents Trump and Zelenskyy and numerous NATO leaders were set to hold a virtual meeting Wednesday ahead of Friday's scheduled summit between Mr. T...

item.title: 8/12: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Trump threatens to sue Jerome Powell over Fed building renovations; Taylor Swift announces new album, “The Life of a Showgirl."

item.title: UK, France and Germany ready to reimpose sanctions on Iran over nuclear programme
item.description: If Iran does not re-engage in talks by the end of the month, sanctions will be reinstated, the E3 says.

item.title: Parts of Juneau brace for flooding from water slipping past Alaska’s Mendenhall Glacier
Tropical Storm Erin likely to become first Atlantic season's first hurricane
item.description: Tropical Storm Erin is likely become a hurricane by late Thursday or early Friday, the National Hurricane Center says. It would be the Atlantic season...

item.title: Drone video shows great white shark lurking near popular beaches
item.description: Clam fisherman David Lancaster was able to take drone footage of the shark swimming just beneath the surface.

item.title: Record glacier-related flooding predicted in Alaska's capital
item.description: Alaska's capital of Juneau is bracing for what could be record floodwaters due to rainwater and snowmelt flowing downstream from a basin dammed by the...

item.title: Why are Trump and Putin meeting in Alaska and when will it happen?
item.description: Trump says he will meet with the Russian leader in the "great state of Alaska".

item.title: Macron admits French repression in Cameroon's independence struggle
item.description: French leader cites independence icons who were killed during military operations led by French forces.

item.title: Israel bombards Gaza City as UK and allies demand action against 'unfolding famine'
item.description: The countries demanded "immediate, permanent and concrete steps" to facilitate the entry of aid to Gaza.

item.title: Massive rescue effort led to pulling workers from debris of Pennsylvania steel plant explosion
Texas shooter who killed 3 outside Target, including a child, randomly chose his victims, police say
item.description: Police say a Texas man fatally shot three people in a Target parking lot, including a child and her grandfather.
